basics.name: Sivvani Muthusamy
basics.summary: Second-year MRSD student at CMU, passionate about perception, localization, and advancing robotics technology.

work.name: Nissan Advanced Technology Center
work.summary: Developed solutions for GPS-denied indoor navigation using fiducial markers and minimal onboard sensing, improving localization accuracy by 10 cm.

work.name: CMU MRSD Capstone Project
work.summary: Generated bird's-eye view (BEV) representations for seamless teleoperation in vehicle parking using infrastructure cameras.

awards.title: KCMET Scholarship for Post Graduate Studies Abroad
awards.summary: Awarded the prestigious KC Mahindra scholarship for postgraduate studies abroad. Ranked among the top 2% of 2000+ participants across India.

awards.title: DAAD WISE Research Fellowship
awards.summary: Recipient of the DAAD WISE fellowship for fully funded undergraduate research. Pursued a research internship at the Munich Institute of Robotics and Machine Intelligence, Technical University of Munich, Germany.

awards.title: NTU India Connect Research Fellowship
awards.summary: Recipient of the NTU India Connect fellowship for fully funded undergraduate research. Conducted research at the School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.

awards.title: Institute Award
awards.summary: Received an honorary award for achieving Rank 1 in my department for the second year.

publications.name: Cognitive Intelligence in Industrial Robots and Manufacturing
publications.summary: Highlights the synergy between AI and human cognition to address uncertainties in autonomous manufacturing.

publications.name: Measurement of Sub-Foveal Choroidal Thickness
publications.summary: Introduces a semi-automated method to quantify sub-foveal choroidal thickness using ocular biometry.
